MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 18-FEB-2021 21:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: This is a message for customers in the KA26 postcode area of Girvan. Further to the previous power cut, our engineers will return to site to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6pm to replace the faulty transformers at Balkenna Petrol Station and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.03pm on Thursday 18th February 2021.
